original_text: Then Peter said to the man, ‘I do not have any money. But I do have something else that I will give to you. Jesus Christ from Nazareth gave me authority to do this. So now I tell you to walk!’
korean_text: 베드로가 이르되 은과 금은 내게 없거니와 내게 있는 이것을 네게 주노니 나사렛 예수 그리스도의 이름으로 일어나 걸으라 하고

sentences.original_text: Then Peter said to the man
But I do have something else
that I will give to you
gave me authority to do this
So now I tell you to walk!'
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 이제 내가 당신에게 걸어가라고 말합니다!'
